page.title: 09Religion in Leafield.
page.content:
Most people we asked go to church occasionally.
31 out of 40 people owned a bible
26 out of 40 people were christened
17 out of 40 people believe in ghosts
The church congregation is small at present but is often quite large - it varies from year to year.Children play recorders and sing at Family Matins once a month.The school is church controlled and links are strong.A discussion group,Leafield Forum,meets once a month at the vicarage. The chapel meets every Sunday with a visiting minister.
